messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] first day unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sounds like a GREAT day, Diane.  (But I wanna come live at your house now, since everybody sounds happy AND you have time to clean, too!) I hope you enjoy
messages.messageBody:
12/16/02 23:45:

> All in all, a very good first day of the
> rest of our unschooling lives.

Sounds like a GREAT day, Diane. (But I wanna come live at your house now,
since everybody sounds happy AND you have time to clean, too!)

I hope you enjoy tomorrow, too, even if it rains, is 25 degrees, the kids
wake up grouchy, and the toast is burnt. Figure, heck, at least we're
unschooling and I don't have to deal with school problems on top of all
this!

Here's wishing you another really good day tomorrow, though!

brenda
